text: ya‘ik’ubini moti bemet’abeti gize lelijochu kene behwala manini tigezalachihu bale gize k’erabiwochi neberachihuni? (inerisumi) amilakihinina ye’abatochihini ye’ibirahimini ye’isima‘ilinina ye’isihak’inimi amilaki anidi yehonewini amilaki inya lerisu fits’umi tazazhochi honeni inamelikaleni alu፡፡
